author: Jack Flagler
title: Live Coverage: Friday night football Week 9 updates
text: Live Coverage: Friday night football Week 9 updates Follow along with South Point at Forestview and all the rest of the local action as it happens. Comment By Jack Flagler Posted Oct. 16, 2015 at 5:16 pm Updated at 5:44 PM Follow along with all the local action tonight starting at 7:30 p.m. as games kickoff all over the region in Week 9. South Point at Forestview highlights this week's schedule, but there's plenty going on outside of Gastonia as well. Interested in only one game? Follow our reporters on Twitter to receive all the updates. Don't forget to make your picks for tonight's games here: See if you can beat out Gazette sports editor Jack Flagler and reporter Richard Walker. South Point at Forestview: Twitter coverage -- @jflagler East Gaston at Ashbrook: Twitter coverage -- @JRWalk22 Hunter Huss at Lake Norman Charter: Twitter coverage -- @JLMayberry7 North Gaston at Stuart Cramer: Twitter coverage -- @StuartCramerFB Cherryville at Highland Tech: Twitter coverage -- @GcprofMichael East Lincoln at Newton Conover: Twitter coverage -- @LTN_Sports Lincolnton at Bunker Hill: Twitter coverage -- @DavidKeever Kings Mountain at RS Central: Twitter coverage -- @StarSports_Ian Jack Flagler: jflagler@gastongazette.com, 704-869-1843, Twitter: @jflagler
